question.title: IntelliJ IDEA gives error "Invalid Gradle JDK configuration found" when switching to Java 25
question.body:
I switched to JDK 25 on my Gradle project but IntelliJ keeps complaining about invalid Gradle JDK configuration when pressing the Sync Gradle Changes button. I am using IntelliJ IDEA version 2025.3.1, Gradle version 9.2.0 and java version 25.0.1. I haven't had this problem with other prior Java versions. I also updated JAVA_HOME to point to Java 25.

The SDK set to the JDK 25 folder and is the Gradle JVM on Gradle settings. On Gradle settings I have Wrapper as Distribution:

I've tried restarting IntelliJ, deleting and reading the SDK, restarting my PC and deleting .gradle and .idea folders but those haven't worked.
